page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: Our school,St Martins TRANENT was once a junior and senior secondary taking pupils from 5 to 15 yrs.It is a pink sand stone building and is a bright airy school.It was built in 1931. There are 6 teachers a janitor 2 dinner ladies,2 cleaners,1 part time secretary and 1 auxilliary.Teaching methods have changed over the years and classes are much smaller.Mr Rourke our head master has worked here for 33 yrs.He remembers classes of over 40 children.In 1971 a class at St Martins was burnt down.Vandalisiam in three schools cost Â£700,000 that night:St Martins Primary School has 100 pupils most of whom enjoy school life.There are another three schools in TRANENT. Tranent Infant-240 pupils/11 teachers Tranent Public School 339 pupils/14 teachers.The secordary school Ross High 1000 pupils and 76 teachers.
